entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued July 20 at 3:24PM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...Wet Conditions Through Friday... A weather system will bring rainfall across a wide swath of the West Coast and Western Interior through Thursday night. Rainfall will continue along the coast on Friday. Expect 0.5 to 1.5 inches of rain with this system. This precipitation will cause minor rises to area rivers and streams.

entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued July 20 at 1:19PM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...Elevated Water Levels Continue on the Tanana River... The Tanana River continues to run near bankfull at some locations between Tok and Manley Hot Springs.
